Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.splash

Class SplashScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.StaticScene
      • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.DynamicScene
        • com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.splash.SplashScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Activatable, Clearable, DependencyInjector, Destroyable, KeyListener, TileMapListProvider, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, EntityCollectionSupplier, EntitySpawnerListProvider, SupplierProvider, YaegerScene, TimerListProvider, Updatable, UpdateDelegator, WithTimers
    public class SplashScene
extends DynamicScene
implements WithTimers
    A Splash Screen, being an instance of YaegerScene that will be shown a given number of miliseconds at the start of a YaegerApplication.

      void setupEntities()

      void setupScene()
      Setup the YaegerScene.
      void setupTimers()
      Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method WithTimers.addTimer(Timer) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.
